content.description: This is a well featured route that gets harder 1/3rd of the way up and then to good hold near the top.
content.protection: On top rope you will have many trees to anchor onto. Standard top rope pro set up.
content.location: Walk around, up, and right passing the Upper Bouldering Area. scramble up to the top of the cliff and find the top of the cliff that is to the left (when looking at the cliff from the ground it would be left. When ontop it would be to your right.) of the massive overgrown jug haul, and on the far right of the nice smooth light colored sandstone cliff.

content.description:
This tall face has the potential for 7ish top rope routes or maybe a three bolt sport climb? The wall tapers down to the right and up the hill to a fun boulderable face. 

  The bouldering holds 5 or 6 potential problems.
